valid: For the period 12:00 (UTC) on Fri 14 Nov 2025 to 12:00 (UTC) on Sat 15 Nov 2025
general_synopsis: Atlantic low 986 moving slowly eastwards, expected FitzRoy 991 by 0600 tomorrow. Low Sole 988 expected 100 miles southwest of Sole 992

Thames.text:
Wind
In north, northeasterly 6 to gale 8 in far north. In south, southerly or southeasterly, veering southwesterly for a time, 3 to 5, occasionally 6 at first.
Sea state
In north, moderate or rough in north, slight or moderate in south. in south, slight or moderate.
Weather
In north, rain at times. In south, rain or thundery showers.
Visibility
In north, moderate or good, occasionally poor. In south, good, occasionally poor.
